data/events_outposts.xml$/FTL/event[@nam: You've discovered a Federation outpost! It's mostly staffed by civilians, but it bears the Federation colors nonetheless.
Contact the outpost.

You transfer your Federation ID, just to be sure. They welcome you on-board. "If it isn't the legendary ship we've heard so much about... It is an honor to meet you, captain. Whatever you need, we'll be happy to assist."
Request fuel.
A refuelling team is dispatched to restock your fuel supplies.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Contact the outpost.

You transfer your Federation ID, just to be sure. They welcome you on-board. "If it isn't the legendary ship we've heard so much about... It is an honor to meet you, captain. Whatever you need, we'll be happy to assist."
Request repairs.
A Civilian repair team is dispatched to fix up your ship.
Request fuel.
A refuelling team is dispatched to restock your fuel supplies.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! It's maintained primarily by a staff of Federation officers, though there's plenty of Engi onboard as well.
Contact the outpost.
An Engi official in Federation garb responds. "Federation identity recognized. Orders require assistance be provided to Federation ships passing through. What assistance is required?"
Request fuel.
A large crew drone carrying fuel cells delivers them to your ship and returns to the outpost.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts. The Engis will likely have a larger supply.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Engi Crew) Have your Engi bargain with them for a drone.
"Federation ship requires: drone schematic. Schematic not currently in use, logic suggests drone will serve better use on Federation vessel."
Contact the outpost.
An Engi official in Federation garb responds. "Federation identity recognized. Orders require assistance be provided to Federation ships passing through. What assistance is required?"
Request repairs.
Several hull repair drones are sent out to fix your hull.
Request fuel.
A large crew drone carrying fuel cells delivers them to your ship and returns to the outpost.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts. The Engis will likely have a larger supply.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Engi Crew) Have your Engi bargain with them for a drone.
"Federation ship requires: drone schematic. Schematic not currently in use, logic suggests drone will serve better use on Federation vessel."
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! High energy signatures on-board suggest it's staffed by both Humans and Zoltans.
Contact the outpost.
A Zoltan responds to your hail. "Greetings traveler. Code S-95 requires this outpost to provide aid to any passing Federation vessels. What assistance can we grant you?"
Request fuel.
A box of fuel is brought on-board.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Zoltan Crew) Have your Zoltan bargain with them for a reactor upgrade.
"So you require power? Not an unreasonable request, but still an unexpected one. Yes, we can do this."
Contact the outpost.
A Zoltan responds to your hail. "Greetings friend. Code S-95 requires this outpost to provide aid to any passing Federation vessels. What assistance can we grant you?"
Request repairs.
A team of Zoltan repairmen board the ship and get to work on the hull.
Request fuel.
A box of fuel is brought on-board.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Zoltan Crew) Have your Zoltan bargain with them for a reactor upgrade.
"So you require power? Not an unreasonable request, but still an unexpected one. Yes, we can do this."
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! Knowing the populace of this sector, it's likely to be staffed by a mix of crew including the Orchids.
Contact the outpost.
A silent Orchid beckons for you to come aboard. A human Federation officer welcomes you and asks how they can help.
Request fuel.
A box of fuel is brought on-board by a team of Orchids.
Request ammunition. The Orchids likely have a larger supply.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Orchid Crew) Have your Orchid bargain for a Kernel weapon.
The Federation officer relays your message to the silent Orchid, who nods. They walk into one of the storage rooms and returns with a weapon.
Contact the outpost.
A silent Orchid beckons for you to come aboard. A human Federation officer welcomes you and asks how they can help.
Request repairs.
A group of Orchids sets out to work on your hull.
Request fuel.
A box of fuel is brought on-board by a team of Orchids.
Request ammunition. The Orchids likely have a larger supply.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
(Orchid Crew) Have your Orchid bargain for a Kernel weapon.
The Federation officer relays your message to the silent Orchid, who nods. They walk into one of the storage rooms and returns with a weapon.
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! It's very likely to be staffed by a large group of overly-eager Free Mantis.
Contact the outpost.
As expected, a friendly Free Mantis responds. "Federation, oh goodness. I not think day come. I getting teary... I not know if have tear ducts! Come come, anything you need I give."
Request fuel.
The Free Mantis drag a large box of fuel into your cargo-bay.
Request ammunition.
A team of Mantis bring a crate of missiles onto your ship.
Request droneparts.
A team of Mantis bring a crate of droneparts onto your ship.
(Free Mantis Crew) Suggest that the Free Mantis join your crew.
"You... you want me? Yes, YES! I come now, no need to grab things."
Contact the outpost.
As expected, a friendly Free Mantis responds. "Federation, oh goodness. I not think day come. I getting teary... I not know if have tear ducts! Come come, anything you need I give."
Request repairs.
Luckily, the repair team that comes to meet you consists mostly of Humans and Engi. The Mantis hang back and watch in awe of your ship.
Request fuel.
The Free Mantis drag a large box of fuel into your cargo-bay.
Request ammunition.
A team of Mantis bring a crate of missiles onto your ship.
Request droneparts.
A team of Mantis bring a crate of droneparts onto your ship.
(Free Mantis Crew) Suggest that the Free Mantis join your crew.
"You... you want me? Yes, YES! I come now, no need to grab things."
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! The Federation must have pulled some strings to have an outpost installed in newly-founded Crystal territory.
Contact the outpost.
A Crystal with a few chips in his natural armor responds. "Oh. It's one of you. Come on-board, we'll supply you with whatever you need."
Request fuel.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
Request ammunition.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
Request droneparts.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
(Crystal Crew) Request that the Crystals give you a Crystal weapon.
"Yes, we can arrange this. It will arrive shortly."
Contact the outpost.
A Crystal with a few chips in his natural armor responds. "Oh. It's one of you. Come on-board, we'll supply you with whatever you need."
Request repairs.
A team of Crystals get to work on your hull.
Request fuel.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
Request ammunition.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
Request droneparts.
A crate covered in a thick layer of crystals is brought into your cargo bay.
(Crystal Crew) Request that the Crystals give you a Crystal weapon.
"Yes, we can arrange this. It will arrive shortly."
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! Strange to see one out here in Outcast territory, but with so many other factions using these sectors as shortcuts, it's hard to be surprised anymore.
Contact the outpost.

An Outcast with long, black robes appears on the screen. "The Federation has offered our people decent wages to maintain their outposts. We are sanctioned to provide any renegade vessels passing through with support. What do you need?"
Request fuel.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of fuel and deliver it to your ship.
Request ammunition.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of ammo and deliver it to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of drone parts and deliver it to your ship.
(Rock Crew) Request that the Outcasts give you a missile weapon.
"Allow me to see what we can provide. I'm sure we have something extra in storage."
Contact the outpost.

An Outcast with long, black robes appears on the screen. "The Federation has offered our people decent wages to maintain their outposts. We are sanctioned to provide any renegade vessels passing through with support. What do you need?"
Request repairs.
A team of Outcasts get to work on your hull.
Request fuel.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of fuel and deliver it to your ship.
Request ammunition.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of ammo and deliver it to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A team of Rockmen carry out a box of drone parts and deliver it to your ship.
(Rock Crew) Request that the Outcasts give you a missile weapon.
"Allow me to see what we can provide. I'm sure we have something extra in storage."
Attack the outpost!
You've decided, instead of receiving help, to attack this outpost full of friendlies...
Continue...
You've discovered a Federation outpost! It's fully stocked and staffed by a well maintained Federation staff.
Contact the outpost.
"We're a little busy, so unless you have official business we can't- holy crap! You-you're the Multiverse ship! Welcome, welcome! Anything you need that we can offer is yours."
Request fuel.
A refuelling team is dispatched to restock your fuel supplies.
Request ammunition.
A shipment of ammunition is delivered to your ship.
Request droneparts.
A shipment of droneparts is delivered to your ship.
Contact the outpost.
"We're a little busy, so unless you have official business we can't- holy crap! You-you're the Multiverse ship! Welcome, welcome! Anything you need that we can offer is yours."
Request repairs.
A Federation repair team is dispatched to fix up your hull.
